name: Carnivoc
description:
The game Carnivoc is about a clown who has to manage 2 things at once!

Balancing on a ball (using the arrow keys)
Juggling some items (using the ASDFG keys)

At the right time you have to press the right key in order to keep the crowd motivated!

This is our submition to the BeansJam Mobile, it still has some bugs!
